title: Problem 2138_C1
statement: This is the easy version of the problem. The difference between the versions is that in this version, the constraints on t and n are smaller. You can hack only if you solved all versions of this problem. Maple is given a rooted tree consisting of n vertices numbered from 1 to n, where the root has index 1.
